messages.title: FAIR IS WORTH FIGHTING FOR
messages.content: Re-building the economy, increasing job opportunities and ensuring effective health-care for all will necessitate the planet's future safeguard. Accomplishing these goals will require bold ideas, strong commitment and political will. Overhauling our flawed public transport system, establishing sustainable waste and energy generation strategies, prioritizing affordable housing as the cornerstone for building vibrant communities.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Overhauling our flawed public transport system
Establishing sustainable waste and energy generation strategies
Prioritising affordable housing as the cornerstone for building vibrant communities

issues.economy: Re-building the economy, increasing job opportunities
issues.governance: '2010 is a crunch year for the UK', says Ricky. 'The major parties have let us down badly economically, environmentally and by the erosion of human rights. They have all played their part in this betrayal of trust.'

housing.content: prioritizing affordable housing as the cornerstone for building vibrant communities.

leaflet.personalStatement: 'We are in desperate need of a new politics, with fresh, effective and truly democratic representation. By voting Green, the people of Bristol West send a signal change to the heart of Westminster.'

images.caption: Ricky shopping at St Nicholas Market and campaigning on his battle-bike in the city centre.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Printed on 100% recycled paper using sustainable technologies that do not harm the environment
